power.description: The ID of the power to check for.
power.markdownDescription: The ID of the power to check for.

slot.description: If specified, this will check if the power embedded to the item is assigned to this equipment slot. Accepts one of `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`, `"mainhand"` or `"offhand"`.
slot.markdownDescription: If specified, this will check if the power embedded to the item is assigned to this equipment slot. Accepts one of `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`, `"mainhand"` or `"offhand"`.

type.description:
## Has Power --- [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/has_power) Checks if the item has a power embedded to it. Type ID: `origins:has_power` --- ### Examples ```json "item_condition": { "type": "origins:has_power", "power": "origins:water_breathing" } ``` This example will check if the item has Merling's Gills *(`origins:water_breathing`)* power embedded to it.
```json "item_condition": { "type": "origins:has_power", "power": "origins:elytra", "slot": "chest" } ``` This example will check if the item has Elytrian's Winged *(`origins:elytra`)* power embedded to it.
type.markdownDescription:
## Has Power --- [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/has_power) Checks if the item has a power embedded to it. Type ID: `origins:has_power` --- ### Examples ```json "item_condition": { "type": "origins:has_power", "power": "origins:water_breathing" } ``` This example will check if the item has Merling's Gills *(`origins:water_breathing`)* power embedded to it.
```json "item_condition": { "type": "origins:has_power", "power": "origins:elytra", "slot": "chest" } ``` This example will check if the item has Elytrian's Winged *(`origins:elytra`)* power embedded to it.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Has Power (Item Condition Type) date: 2023-02-26

Has Power

Item Condition Type

Checks if the item has a power embedded to it.

Type ID: origins:has_power

Fields

Field Type Default Description
power Identifier The ID of the power to check for.
slot String optional If specified, this will check if the power embedded to the item is assigned to this equipment slot. Accepts one of "head", "chest", "legs", "feet", "mainhand" or "offhand".

Examples

"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:has_power",
    "power": "origins:water_breathing"
}

This example will check if the item has Merling's Gills (origins:water_breathing) power embedded to it. 

"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:has_power",
    "power": "origins:elytra",
    "slot": "chest"
}

This example will check if the item has Elytrian's Winged (origins:elytra) power embedded to it.
